user_question: How can I optimize the energy consumption of my IoT devices at home, and can you generate an image of a smart home setup?
final_answer: To optimize energy consumption of IoT devices: 1) Use smart plugs to monitor usage. 2) Schedule devices to turn off when not in use. 3) Use energy-efficient devices like smart thermostats, LED smart bulbs, and energy-monitoring smart plugs. Image of a smart home setup generated.
